item.title: Report E-2023090529
item.description:
Report E-2023090529

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: PORT ALLEN
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During the QC process in the warehouse at Veolia's 10 day intransit facility, the drum was removed from the pallet to be weighed. The drum was weighed and set aside for approximately 30 minutes. When the employee returned back to the drum, he noticed a very small pinhole leak coming from the side, rib area of the drum. The leak was minor and the drum was promptly overpacked and the spill was cleaned up.

item.title: Report E-2023090521
item.description:
Report E-2023090521

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: PORT ALLEN
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During QC process in the warehouse at Veolia's 10 day intransit facility, the drum was removed from the pallet to be weighed when the Veolia employee noticed a small amount of liquid on the pallet that the drum was loaded on. Upon inspection, several small pinhole leaks were identified on the bottom of the drum. The leak was minor and the drum was promptly overpacked and the spill was cleaned up.

item.title: Report E-2023090595
item.description:
Report E-2023090595

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: MONROE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the metal 55 gallon drum of solvent (un1993) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 1 gallon of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report E-2023090562
item.description:
Report E-2023090562

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: SHREVEPORT
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse accidentally put a forklift fork into one of the metal 5 gallon pail of paint (un1263) releasing 5 gallons of paint. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.
